summary: My old character Vee in Follower Form.
descriptionHtml:
She\'s completely Standalone, so only Skyrim is required.

Amerem, a friend of mine, mentioned that a character I made would make a nice follower, so I set out on a journey.

This is the result.

PS: Feel free to edit her to your liking, just don\'t release it anywhere without my express permission
Also, she\'s in the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood.

Changelog
V2Beta - I changed the Texture to the UNP texture.  That fixed the Neckseam
V1Beta - Initial

Planned updates
I\'m not sure yet

Installation:
Copy the Data folder in your Skyrim Folder.  Overwrite when asked.

Uninstall:
delete the Files that say Vee in your Textures and Meshes.

Credits 
HoneyVanity for the fabulous skin in V1 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24318
Apachii for the Hair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
Dimon99 for the UNP body - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709
Ithot for those wonderful eyebrows - http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30411
LithiumFlower for those beautiful eyes - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26354
Radioragae for the Facegen I used to make the original character - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6953
Bethesda for Skyrim
author: Amor
